sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用戶界面旋鈕型的直觀且易於使用。

sentences.english: Three-dimensional cyclone , naked eye visual , Newman D40 naked eye 3D player.
sentences.chinese: 立體旋風，裸眼直觀，紐曼D40裸眼3D播放器。

sentences.english: Intuitively, we think in terms of abstraction.
sentences.chinese: 直觀地，我們從抽象方面進行思考。

sentences.english: The program is straight forward and user intuitive.
sentences.chinese: 該方案是直接向前和用戶直觀。

sentences.english: We will present an ocular demonstration.
The modeling language is a proprietary one, reducing intuitiveness.
sentences.chinese: 建模語言也是廠商特有的，缺乏直觀性。

sentences.english: The decorative case is dapper. The decorative case has perfect visual effects on treasuring articles.
sentences.chinese: 該裝飾盒小巧玲瓏，珍藏物品時有較好的直觀效果。

sentences.english: I simply mean that we intuitively understand collaboration.
sentences.chinese: 我僅僅是說我們直觀地瞭解協作。

sentences.english: The transparent bag of rope wooding is designed, ocular and durable.
sentences.chinese: 透明袋纏繩設計，直觀耐用。

sentences.english: But its counter-intuitive nature is exactly what makes it sexy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，它的反直觀性恰好就是它的魅力所在。

sentences.english: How intuitive will the system be to a non-user?
sentences.chinese: 對於一個非用戶來說直觀感受如何？
一款非常直觀的廣告攔截器。

sentences.english: The result intuitionistically reflects the actual circumstances and is convenient for appraisal and comparison.
sentences.chinese: 評價結果直觀地反映了實際情況，且便於評價和比較。

sentences.english: Now comes the very nonintuitive part.
sentences.chinese: 現在來說這個很反直觀的部分。

sentences.english: Visual attribute is the self-creation of Chinese painting with the premise of personal originality.
sentences.chinese: 直觀的自我屬性是中國畫創作具有個人獨創性的前提。

sentences.english: It was an intuitionist method for judge whether have a chirp in laser pulse.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法能夠直觀的檢測光脈衝是否含有啁啾。
